heading: HB01771
0: AN ACT SEPARATING THE KISANTE NATIONAL HIGH SCHOOL - BATASAN ANNEX IN BARANGAY BATASAN, MUNICIPALITY OF MAKILALA, PROVINCE OF COTABATO FROM THE KISANTE NATIONAL HIGH SCHOOL, CONVERTING IT INTO AN INDEPENDENT NATIONAL HIGH SCHOOL TO BE KNOWN AS BATASAN NATIONAL HIGH SCHOOL AND APPROPRIATING FUNDS THEREFOR
